name: Ascension (Vulture Party, RainbowCemetery)
description:
Shatter material goods to stoke the flames, but beware the mysterious creature lurking at the edge of your vision.

Default Controls:
ArrowKeys - Move
Z - Attack
X - Jump
A - Dash

Advanced Techniques:
Jump in Midair for a DoubleJump
Jump towards a wall to WallGrab
Cancelling a Dash with an Attack grants temporary Invulnerability

Xaris Lynn - Concept Art/Design
RainbowCemetery - Code
Clayzulah - Music
